title: Manage Equipment Warranty Claim
description: A major component on a new haul truck fails prematurely while still under warranty. A maintenance manager must file a claim with the manufacturer (OEM).

tasks.description: Verify that the failed component (e.g., a final drive) is still within its warranty period based on its operating hours.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system confirms the component is still under warranty.

tasks.description: Gather all required documentation for the claim, including the failure report, maintenance records, and photos of the failed part.
tasks.expected_outcome: A complete package of supporting documentation is compiled.

tasks.description: Submit the warranty claim to the OEM through their online portal.
tasks.expected_outcome: The claim is successfully submitted, and a claim number is received for tracking.
